column3: I don't understand this change, why change this to an external link?
I think I forgot to adjust this when I moved the file to the new docs repository
Yea, it's just to save a hop to `gitian-building.md` in this repo, which just redirects you to `https://github.com/bitcoin-core/docs/blob/master/gitian-building.md` anyways.
OH, it refers to a different file, hadn't noticed
